name: GetRelatedEnvironmentGroups
description:
Retrieve related environment groups for a project.

Use this tool to obtain information about environment groups that are related to a specified project. This can be useful for understanding the interconnections and dependencies within an environment setup.

parameters.name: group_type_identifier
parameters.description: An integer representing the specific group type to locate within the environment groups.

value_schema.description: Specify the group type to find

parameters.name: user_id_for_group_search
parameters.description: The ID of the user for whom you want to find related groups. This helps in retrieving specific group associations for the given user.

value_schema.description: Specify the id of the user to find groups for

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project to access related environment groups. Obtainable via a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
